amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Health and Human Services created; divisions.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Health and Human Services is created. The department shall have six divisions to be known as (1) the Division of Behavioral Health, (2) the Division of Children and Family Services, (3) the Division of Developmental Disabilities, (4) the Division of Medicaid and Long-Term Care, (5) the Division of Public Health, and (6) the Division of Veterans' Homes.
